events.title: Bobby Fischer loses to Boris Spassky in the Piatigorsky Cup

movie.title: Pawn Sacrifice
movie.plot: During the height of the Cold War, American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer finds himself caught between two superpowers when he challenges the Soviet Empire.

events.title: Elliot Tiber attends the Woodstock festival

movie.title: Taking Woodstock
movie.plot: A man working at his parents' motel in the Catskills inadvertently sets in motion the generation-defining concert in the summer of 1969.

events.title: Soraya Manutchehri is stoned to death

movie.title: The Stoning of Soraya M.
movie.plot: A drama set in Iran and centered on a man, Sahebjam, whose car breaks down in a remote village and enters into a conversation with Zahra, who relays to him the story about her niece, Soraya, whose marriage had a tragic ending.

movie.title: 15 August
movie.plot: On India's Independence Day, a zany mishap in a Mumbai chawl disrupts a young love story while compelling the residents to unite in aid of a little boy.
